channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Smart Camera X3, X5, and C2E firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Smart Camera X3, X5, and C2E firmware

item.title: CVE-2021-3616|2024-08-03T17:01:07.695Z -- lenovo -- smart%20camera%20x3%2C%20x5%2C%20and%20c2e%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Smart Camera X3, X5, and C2E that could allow an unauthorized user to view device information, alter firmware content and device configuration. This vulnerability is the same as CNVD-2020-68651.

item.title: CVE-2021-3617|2024-08-03T17:01:07.803Z -- lenovo -- smart%20camera%20x3%2C%20x5%2C%20and%20c2e%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Smart Camera X3, X5, and C2E that could allow command injection by setting a specially crafted network configuration. This vulnerability is the same as CNVD-2020-68652.

item.title: CVE-2021-3615|2024-08-03T17:01:07.341Z -- lenovo -- smart%20camera%20x3%2C%20x5%2C%20and%20c2e%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Smart Camera X3, X5, and C2E that could allow code execution if a specific file exists on the attached SD card. This vulnerability is the same as CNVD-2021-45262.
